Stopped by here my last night in Barcelona.  Sat at the bar and the service was decent.  The hot tapas were good, except for the beef and cheese.  The beef was still bloody and very medium rare, which is not how I like my meat at all.  I was hoping I didn't leave with food poisoning.  The chocolate cake dessert and the cheesecake were delicious and probably the best part of the meal.  Prices for everything was spot on.
